mapper.sql: id, province, provinceid, city, cityid, area, areaid,country,countryid,continent,continentid,latitude,longitude
mapper.select: select distinct province, provinceid from tb_rs_city where countryid = #{countryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select distinct province, provinceid from tb_rs_city where areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select DISTINCT continentid from tb_rs_city where countryid=#{0}
select DISTINCT areaid from tb_rs_city where cityid=#{0}
